Actions.Text: AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO HIGHER EDUCATION
AMEND (T) AND RECOMMIT TO HIGHER EDUCATION

Title: Permits certain registered pharmacy technicians to assist a licensed pharmacist in preparing prescriptions in certain facilities
Summary: Permits certain registered pharmacy technicians to assist a licensed pharmacist in preparing prescriptions in facilities licensed pursuant to articles twenty-eight or thirty-one of the public health law, or a pharmacy owned and operated by such facility, under the direct supervision of a licensed pharmacist employed by such facility.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to permitting certain registered pharmacy technicians assisting in home infusion services through a home care agency to assist a licensed pharmacist in preparing prescriptions
